title: HOUR 1 - Harbaugh, Brady-Belichick, Stafford
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Harbaugh, Brady-Belichick, Stafford
description:
Jim Harbaugh is staying at Michigan

Patriots fans are overthinking who should get more credit between Brady and Belichick

The pressure has been on Matthew Stafford during the regular season


Guest: Jonathan Vilma
